attributes.action: Change the timings of Dustbin and recycle lorries.
attributes.additional_details: Dustbin/recycle lorries can have a different schedule which doesn’t clash with school pick and drop timings, 8:30am-9:30am and 2:30pm -3:30pm during weekdays.
attributes.background: Dustbin/recycle lorries are a major obstruction during school-runs, it causes chaos and children being late to school,some roads are one way and cannot be passed until the lorry has moved, it can lead upto being late to drop off our children to school by 20-30 minutes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are a matter for local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.
